# iosxr_evpn_segment_routing_srv6_stitching_evi (Resource)

This resource can manage the EVPN Segment Routing SRv6 Stitching EVI configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_evpn_segment_routing_srv6_stitching_evi" "example" {
  vpn_id                     = 104
  description                = "My Description"
  bgp_rd_four_byte_as_number = 65536
  bgp_rd_four_byte_as_index  = 104
  bgp_route_target_import_four_byte_as_format = [
    {
      as_number       = 65536
      assigned_number = 104
    }
  ]
  bgp_route_target_export_four_byte_as_format = [
    {
      as_number       = 65536
      assigned_number = 104
    }
  ]
  bgp_route_policy_import     = "EVI_POLICY_1"
  bgp_route_policy_export     = "EVI_POLICY_1"
  preferred_nexthop_modulo    = true
  unknown_unicast_suppression = true
  ignore_mtu_mismatch         = true
  ignore_mtu_mismatch_disable = true
  transmit_mtu_zero           = true
  transmit_mtu_zero_disable   = true
  re_origination_disable      = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `vpn_id` (Number) Configure EVPN Instance VPN ID
  - Range: `1`-`65534`

### Optional

- `advertise_mac` (Boolean) Configure locally-learned MAC advertisement
- `advertise_mac_bvi_mac` (Boolean) Advertise local MAC and BVI MAC routes
- `bgp_implicit_import_disable` (Boolean) Disable BGP implicit import
- `bgp_rd_four_byte_as_index` (Number) AS:nn (hex or decimal format)
  - Range: `0`-`65535`
- `bgp_rd_four_byte_as_number` (Number) Four Byte AS number
  - Range: `65536`-`4294967295`
- `bgp_rd_ipv4_address` (String) IP address
- `bgp_rd_ipv4_address_index` (Number) IP-address:nn (hex or decimal format)
  - Range: `0`-`65535`
- `bgp_rd_two_byte_as_index` (Number) AS:nn (hex or decimal format)
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`
- `bgp_rd_two_byte_as_number` (Number) Two Byte AS Number
  - Range: `1`-`65535`
- `bgp_route_policy_export` (String) Export route policy
- `bgp_route_policy_import` (String) Import route policy
- `bgp_route_target_export_four_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) Four Byte AS number Route Target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--bgp_route_target_export_four_byte_as_format))
- `bgp_route_target_export_ipv4_address_format` (Attributes List) IP address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--bgp_route_target_export_ipv4_address_format))
- `bgp_route_target_export_two_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) Two Byte AS Number Route Target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--bgp_route_target_export_two_byte_as_format))
- `bgp_route_target_four_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) Four Byte AS number Route Target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--bgp_route_target_four_byte_as_format))
- `bgp_route_target_import_four_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) Four Byte AS number Route Target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--bgp_route_target_import_four_byte_as_format))
- `bgp_route_target_import_ipv4_address_format` (Attributes List) IP address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--bgp_route_target_import_ipv4_address_format))
- `bgp_route_target_import_two_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) Two Byte AS Number Route Target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--bgp_route_target_import_two_byte_as_format))
- `bgp_route_target_ipv4_address_format` (Attributes List) IP address (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--bgp_route_target_ipv4_address_format))
- `bgp_route_target_two_byte_as_format` (Attributes List) Two Byte AS Number Route Target (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--bgp_route_target_two_byte_as_format))
- `bgp_table_policy` (String) Configure policy for installation of forwarding data to L2FIB
- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `description` (String) Description for this EVPN Instance
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `ignore_mtu_mismatch` (Boolean) Ignore mismatch of local and remote MTUs
- `ignore_mtu_mismatch_disable` (Boolean) Disables ingoring mismatch of local and remote MTUs
- `locator` (String) EVI locator to use for EVPN SID allocation
- `preferred_nexthop_highest_ip` (Boolean) Highest nexthop IP is active
- `preferred_nexthop_lowest_ip` (Boolean) Lowest nexthop IP is active
- `preferred_nexthop_modulo` (Boolean) EVI modulo of nexthops cardinality is active
- `re_origination_disable` (Boolean) Disable route re-origination
- `transmit_mtu_zero` (Boolean) Transmit MTU zero to remote instead of actual local MTU
- `transmit_mtu_zero_disable` (Boolean) Disables transmitting MTU zero to remote instead of actual local MTU
- `unknown_unicast_suppression` (Boolean) Enabling unknown unicast suppression

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_evpn_segment_routing_srv6_stitching_evi.example "<vpn_id>"
```
